sqlMap.select:
SELECT RP.REC_PROG_NO, RP.REC_PROG_NAME, RP.REC_PROG_MEMO, LISTAGG(CD.DETAIL_CODE_NAME, ' > ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY RPSI.STEP_SEQ) AS STEP_ITEM_LIST, RP.WRITER, RP.WRITE_DATE FROM REC_PROG RP, REC_PROG_STEP_ITEM RPSI, CODE_DETAIL CD WHERE RP.REC_PROG_NO = RPSI.REC_PROG_NO AND RPSI.STEP_ITEM_CODE = CD.DETAIL_CODE AND RP.ENABLE_TF = 'T' AND RPSI.ENABLE_TF = 'T'
AND REC_PROG_NAME LIKE upper('%'||#searchValue#||'%')
AND REC_PROG_MEMO LIKE upper('%'||#searchValue#||'%')
GROUP BY RP.REC_PROG_NO, RP.REC_PROG_NAME, RP.REC_PROG_MEMO, RP.WRITER, RP.WRITE_DATE ORDER BY RP.REC_PROG_NO DESC
SELECT REC_PROG_NO, REC_PROG_NAME, REC_PROG_MEMO FROM REC_PROG WHERE ENABLE_TF = 'T' ORDER BY REC_PROG_NO DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REC_PROG (REC_PROG_NO, REC_PROG_NAME, REC_PROG_MEMO, WRITER, WRITE_DATE, ENABLE_TF, VERSION) VALUES (#rec_prog_no#, #rec_prog_name#, #rec_prog_memo#, #writer#, SYSDATE, 'T', 1)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REC_PROG SET REC_PROG_NAME = #rec_prog_name#, REC_PROG_MEMO = #rec_prog_memo#, MODIFIER = #modifier#, MODI_DATE = SYSDATE, VERSION = version+1 WHERE REC_PROG_NO = #rec_prog_no#
UPDATE REC_PROG SET ENABLE_TF = 'F' WHERE REC_PROG_NO = #rec_prog_no#
